channel.title: Making it say the rights things when you right click
channel.description:
I was wondering how to make it do this... for me now trade is the first option and stuff, ive messed around with the options trying to fix it and i had no luck,
How do i make it so its like this
Not in wild ----------------- Walk Here Follow Trade ------------------- in wild -------------------- Attack Walk Here Follow Trade
and ideas?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 28, 2006, 11:11:04 PM[/size][hr]Any one know this..?

item.title: Making it say the rights things when you right click
item.dc:creator: @Wolfeyes217 Wolfeyes217
item.description:
@Wolfeyes217 wrote:

I was wondering how to make it do this… for me now trade is the first option and stuff, ive messed around with the options trying to fix it and i had no luck,

How do i make it so its like this

Not in wild

Walk Here
Follow
Trade

in wild

Attack
Walk Here
Follow
Trade

and ideas?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 28, 2006, 11:11:04 PM[/size][hr]Any one know this…?
